price: Can you make the deaf hear, or guide the blind or the one who is clearly misguided?
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
